thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shui On Land Clarifies On Media Coverage Regarding Potential Privatisation

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shui On Land Clarifies On Media Coverage Regarding Potential Privatisation
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Shui On Land Ltd:
* NOTED MEDIA COVERAGE ON POTENTIAL PRIVATISATION PLAN OF CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER LO HONG SUI
* INFORMED BY LO HE HAS BEEN REVIEWING OPTIONS REGARDING THE CO, WHICH INCLUDES POSSIBILITY OF ACQUIRING CO‘S ENTIRE ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL
* ‍NO DEFINITE PLANS HAVE BEEN DETERMINED REGARDING LO HANG SUI‘S INTEREST IN CO​
* INFORMED BY LO THAT HE IS IN TALKS WITH BANKS FOR FINANCING AND HAS BEEN REVIEWING OPTIONS REGARDING HIS INTEREST IN CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
